Mt Wutai in Shanxi 山西[Shan1 xi1], one of the Four Sacred Mountains and home of the Bodhimanda of Manjushri 文殊[Wen2 shu1]

Taishan county level city in Jiangmen 江門|江门, Guangdong
Taishanese, a language of the Yue language group 粵語|粤语[Yue4 yu3] spoken in Jiangmen 江門|江门[Jiang1 men2] and in the Chinatowns of North America

sentences.english: Wutai Mountain located at Shanxi Province northeast within the boundaries of Wutai County.
sentences.chinese: 五台山位于山西省东北部五台县境内。

sentences.english: Results show that it is in the Wutai mountain area that convective storms happened frequently.
sentences.chinese: 指出五台山是强对流天气的多发区。

sentences.english: Mount Wutai in China as one of the four famous Buddhist.
sentences.chinese: 五台山为我国四大佛教名山之一。

sentences.english: Did you watch the football game in Wutaishan stadium last night ?
sentences.chinese: 你昨晚去五台山体育馆看足球赛了吗？

sentences.english: Taishan is well known as the hometown of overseas Chinese in Southern China.
sentences.chinese: 台山是我国岭南著名的华侨之乡。

sentences.english: It has been applied to the environmental plan of Urban District…
sentences.chinese: 模型已在台山市区环境规划中得到了应用，效果良好。

sentences.english: My sister and Miss Li Yan were in Yuntai Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 我的小妹和李岩在云台山。

sentences.english: Mr. Li Tieying, new President of Toy Shan Association, extended his holiday greetings to the guests.
sentences.chinese: 台山同乡会新任会长李铁英向来宾致以新春问候。

sentences.english: Standing Yantai mountain, overlooking the Yantai can picture.
sentences.chinese: 站在烟台山上，可尽览烟台市全貌。

sentences.english: Did you watch the football match in Wutaishan stadium last night ?
sentences.chinese: 你昨晚去五台山体育馆看足球比赛了吗？

sentences.english: Click to see the Ambassador offer a personal greeting in Cantonese and Taishanese.
sentences.chinese: 点击观看大使亲自说的广东话和台山话问候。

sentences.english: Thousands of years' history stays in the book sets.
sentences.chinese: 书台山，留下千年的史册。

sentences.english: It is famous for black-sand beach of Tonggu black-sand bay in Taishan, Guangdong province.
sentences.chinese: 广东台山铜鼓黑沙湾因黑沙滩而闻名。

sentences.english: Our school stands by the Jiushan River, not far from the Songtai Hill.
sentences.chinese: 我们的学校位于九山河畔，离松台山不远。

sentences.english: The peaks of Tiantai Mountain in Zhejiang are green and black. They stand like an ornamental screen.
sentences.chinese: 浙江天台山的山峰是青黛色的，犹如竖起的画屏。

sentences.english: In the Mount are second to none.
sentences.chinese: 在五台山是首屈一指的。
